example.name: sentential arg2
example.text: ``*trace* Thank God we have some deal on the table,'' said Stewart Gilchrist, a director at Scottish Amicable Investment Managers, which intends to vote its roughly 1% stake in favor of the restructuring.
example.arg: we have some deal on the table
example.note: This could be paraphrased as "Thank god for the fact that we have...",indicating that the sentence is equivalent to a PP. Because of this,though, be sure to include the complementizer, even if it's empty.
